body_text: When using Object.assign, I tend to assign everything to an empty object to start - e.g. Object.assign({}, ClientEnvironment.getEnvironment(), ...). Realistically, it probably doesn't make a difference.
body: When using `Object.assign`, I tend to assign everything to an empty object to start - e.g. `Object.assign({}, ClientEnvironment.getEnvironment(), ...)`. Realistically, it probably doesn't make a difference.
body_html: When using Object.assign, I tend to assign everything to an empty object to start - e.g. Object.assign({}, ClientEnvironment.getEnvironment(), ...). Realistically, it probably doesn't make a difference.
